mapper.select: SELECT pcode, pname, pprice, p.bno, bname, p.dept1no, p.dept2no, dept2name, pvolume, ptype, pexp, puse, pproduce, pcountry, pcaution, pingredient, rates FROM product p JOIN brand b ON p.bno=b.bno JOIN category_dept2 d2 ON p.dept2no=d2.dept2no WHERE pcode=#{pcode}
SELECT iloc, itype, pcode FROM (SELECT pcode, iloc, UPPER(itype) AS itype FROM img) WHERE pcode=#{pcode} AND itype='THUMB'
SELECT iloc, itype, pcode FROM (SELECT pcode, iloc, UPPER(itype) AS itype FROM img) WHERE pcode=#{pcode} AND itype='DETAIL'
